mapper.select: SELECT mp.id, mp.meeting_id , mp.meeting_user_id , mp.sign_in_time, mp.sign_back_time, mp.creator_account, mp.created_time, mp.modifier_account, mp.modified_time, o.department_name AS departmentName, o.account, o.`NAME` as userName, CASE WHEN mp.sign_in_time <= meeting.start_time THEN '正常' WHEN mp.sign_in_time > meeting.start_time THEN '迟到' WHEN mp.sign_in_time IS NULL THEN '未打卡' ELSE NULL END signInStatus, CASE WHEN mp.sign_back_time >= meeting.end_time THEN '正常' WHEN mp.sign_back_time < meeting.end_time THEN '早退' WHEN mp.sign_back_time IS NULL THEN '未打卡' ELSE NULL END signOutStatus FROM tb_oa_meeting_participants mp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.start_time, m.end_time, m.title, m.id, m.meeting_room_id FROM tb_oa_meeting m ) meeting ON meeting.id = mp.meeting_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.NAME, t.account, tt.department_name FROM tb_sys_user t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.user_id, t2.department_name FROM tb_sys_user_department_post t1 INNER JOIN tb_sys_department t2 ON t1.department_id = t2.id WHERE t1.is_default = 1 AND t1.record_status = 1 AND t2.record_status = 1 ) tt ON t.id = tt.user_id WHERE t.record_status = 1 ) o ON mp.meeting_user_id = o.id where 1=1 and mp.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT mp.id, mp.meeting_id , mp.meeting_user_id , mp.sign_in_time, mp.sign_back_time, mp.creator_account, mp.created_time, mp.modifier_account, mp.modified_time, meeting.title, date_format( meeting.start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS meeting_start_date, date_format( meeting.start_time, '%k:%i' ) AS meeting_start_time, date_format( meeting.end_time, '%k:%i' ) AS meeting_end_time, o.department_name AS departmentName, o.account, o.`NAME` as userName, meeting.meeting_room_id, CASE WHEN mp.sign_in_time <= meeting.start_time THEN '正常' WHEN mp.sign_in_time > meeting.start_time THEN '迟到' WHEN mp.sign_in_time IS NULL THEN '未打卡' ELSE NULL END signInStatus, CASE WHEN mp.sign_back_time >= meeting.end_time THEN '正常' WHEN mp.sign_back_time < meeting.end_time THEN '早退' WHEN mp.sign_back_time IS NULL THEN '未打卡' ELSE NULL END signOutStatus FROM tb_oa_meeting_participants mp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.start_time, m.end_time, m.title, m.id, m.meeting_room_id FROM tb_oa_meeting m ) meeting ON meeting.id = mp.meeting_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.NAME, t.account, tt.department_name FROM tb_sys_user t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.user_id, t2.department_name FROM tb_sys_user_department_post t1 INNER JOIN tb_sys_department t2 ON t1.department_id = t2.id WHERE t1.is_default = 1 AND t1.record_status = 1 AND t2.record_status = 1 ) tt ON t.id = tt.user_id WHERE t.record_status = 1 ) o ON mp.meeting_user_id = o.id where 1=1
and mp.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mp.meeting_user_id=#{meetingUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and meeting.name like CONCAT('%', #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and meeting.title like CONCAT('%', #{meetingTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND Date(meeting.start_time) <= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m')
AND Date(meeting.end_time) >= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m')

select id, meeting_room_id AS meetingRoomId, photo_url as photoUrl, record_status as recordStatus, creator_account as creatorAccount, created_time as createdTime, modifier_account as modifierAccount, modified_time as modifiedTime, remark from tb_oa_meeting_room_photo where record_status=1 and meeting_room_id=#{meetingRoomId}
